no-server-found: §cNo %%game%% server found, please try again soon!
not-enough-players-kick: §cNot enough players joined, try and requeue!
game-start-delayed: §f§lGame start has been delayed! §7Expanded the timer and announced the game in lobbies to get players to join!
server-full: §7The server is full, starting in 10 seconds!
removed-from-queue-too-long: §cYou were removed from the queue as it has been longer than 2 minutes!
